cmp: 门 (opening/door/gate/doorway/gateway/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy))
mng: to express, to disclose, to enlighten, to open

exm.mng: to expound (a position), to elaborate (on a topic), to treat (a subject)
to elucidate, to explain clearly, to expound
to explain, to expound, to interpret, elucidation
to elucidate, to expound, to study and explain
to elucidate, to study and expound
